title: Preparing for HTB CPTS Exam
description: Currently preparing for the Hack The Box Certified Penetration Testing Specialist (CPTS) exam to enhance penetration testing skills, through solving practical offensive security labs.

title: Solved and Documented "RomCom" Sherlock by Hack The Box
description: Solved and documented "RomCom" Sherlock by Hack The Box, which involved analyzing a recent WinRAR vulnerability and how it was used to exploit a Windows system.

title: Solved "Telly" Sherlock by Hack The Box
description: Solved "Telly" Sherlock by Hack The Box, which involved analyzing a compromised backup server and checking how the attacker got access and what level of damage he did.
